ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Re: Does the client contribute to the RESTfulness of an application?

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

This discussion helped me understand that ...

   - RESTful is the service, not the system, and
   - the client can leverage such restfulness at varying levels (sometimes
   conditioned by circumstances).

The proof , in one gedanken experiment, is that one could implement equal
clients (from the user's standpoint) with totally different backends.
As I'm an IxD guy (but with a many year development background), my vision
might be different.
--
Juan

--047d7b33d868aaf3db04bae3131c
